vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt Struct Reference

Detailed Description

Structure for converting LUT format from user format to ip required format Pointer to this structure is passed as an argument to ioctl VPS_ISS_IPIPE_IOCTL_UPDATE_LUT_FMT.

struct vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt

Field Documentation

uint32_t* vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt::gammaLutIn

The CMODEL Lut

uint32_t* vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt::gammaLutOut

IP Lut

uint32_t* vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt::lut3DBlue

3D Lut for the Blue Color Each Lut size is 768 and each Lut entry is 10bit

uint32_t* vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt::lut3DGreen

3D Lut for the Green Color

uint32_t* vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt::lut3DRed

3D Lut for the Red Color

vpsissIpipeModule_t vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt::moduleId

Module for which Lut requires to be converted Currently on 3D LUT module id is supported

uint32_t* vpsissIpipeLutFmtCnvt::out3DB0Addr

Pointer to the Array 0 address
